data.text: @TheEliKlein They just keep repeating it. Unfortunately, modern liberals are so gullible and void of independent/critical thoughts, that they believe it. And they’ve been weaponized by a successful “othering” campaign, and they now fight the wars for their leaders. Fueled by corporate media. https://t.co/CLQTECyvqC
@BenChiarolanza @TheEliKlein Look at the number of cases while masked in nyc
@TheEliKlein Proof Proof Proof that all you care about! How about you prove it doesn't work! Haha
@TheEliKlein Same goes for vaccine requirements— how does NYC and LA and SF go back to normal when so many were convinced proof of vaccination is the only way to be as close to normal

@TheEliKlein How do you teach these politicians we did not elect them to control us? We are going to have to do something very aggressive if we ever hope to reverse the damage we have done to ourselves by complying in these past two years.
@robertchihade @TheEliKlein Which makes no sense as they may have as good immunity to Covid by now as public service workers and doctors/nurses since they’re exposed constantly
